term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - permittivity of vacuum
term.title: permittivity of vacuum

item.text: Fundamental physical constant ɛ0 = 1/(µ0.c02) exactly, where µ 0 is the permeability of vacuum and c0 the speed of light in vacuum. It is equal to 8.854187817... x 10E-12 F m-1.
